outputs.output_descr: The project will focus on four key priorities: (1) undertaking a National Risk and Vulnerability Assessment for informed decision-making; (2) mainstreaming Disaster and Climate Risk Management in public planning; (3) establishing and strengthening institutional and operational mechanisms for the implementation of the National Disaster Risk Management Policy; and (4) expanding community-based disaster risk reduction with special emphasis on promoting women's participation.

project_descr: Reduce the risks of natural disasters and climate change through promoting scientific information, and strengthening national, district and community-level capacity for prevention/ mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.
